summary: This document is an email chain between prosecutors and defense attorneys regarding the scheduling of a call and the identification of a trial witness from JPMorgan for the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case. It reveals coordination between the parties on trial preparation and witness logistics.

persons.name: Allison Stoddart
persons.context: Attorney from WilmerHale representing or involved in the Ghislaine Maxwell case, coordinating scheduling and witness matters with prosecutors.

persons.name: Anjan Sahni
persons.context: Attorney from WilmerHale copied on emails regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case, involved in discussions about trial witnesses.

persons.name: Pat McHugh
persons.context: Individual whom the defense team wishes to set up a call with; appears to be associated with the case or investigation.

persons.name: Maurene
persons.context: Assistant United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, corresponding with defense about trial witness from JPMorgan.

persons.name: Lara
persons.context: Assistant United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, corresponding with defense about trial witness from JPMorgan.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, referenced in the subject line of all correspondence.

connections.description: Both are attorneys at WilmerHale working together on the Ghislaine Maxwell defense team, as evidenced by being copied on the same emails.
Defense attorney corresponding with prosecutor regarding trial logistics and witness identification for the Maxwell case.
Defense attorney corresponding with prosecutor regarding trial logistics and witness identification for the Maxwell case.
Defense attorney attempting to arrange a call with Pat McHugh, suggesting a professional relationship relevant to the case.

events.title: Potential call scheduling
events.description: Discussion about scheduling a call between the defense team and Pat McHugh for Thursday afternoon or evening.

events.title: Previous call discussion
events.description: Previous attempt to schedule a call between the defense team and prosecutors regarding trial witness topics.

events.title: Subpoena discussion
events.description: Prosecutors provide a broadly worded subpoena to JPMorgan for a trial witness, and defense requests a trial appearance subpoena.

locations: 7 World Trade Center, 250 Greenwich Street, New York, NY 10007

keyFacts: Prosecutors and defense attorneys are coordinating to identify an appropriate trial witness from JPMorgan for the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The defense team requested a trial appearance subpoena for the JPMorgan witness.
Jury selection for United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled to be underway in November 2021.
The correspondence shows ongoing pretrial preparation and logistical coordination between the parties.
The document reveals professional communication between adversarial legal teams regarding witness logistics.
